# passthroughViews

**Instance Property**

An array of views that the user can interact with while the popover is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var passthroughViews: [UIView]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a popover is active, interactions with other views are normally disabled until the popover is dismissed. Assigning an array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] objects to this property causes UIKit to continue dispatching touch event to the views you specified.

## Configuring the popover appearance

- **popoverLayoutMargins**: The margins that define the portion of the screen in which it is permissible to display the popover.
- **backgroundColor**: The color of the popover’s backdrop view.
- **popoverBackgroundViewClass**: The class to use for displaying the popover background content.
- **canOverlapSourceViewRect**: A Boolean value indicating whether the popover can overlap its view rectangle.
